channel.title: How the hell?!
channel.description:
Just recently I found a bug that allows a player to scam in a trade screen.
Here are the steps to preforming it. Here are the steps.
1. Place item up for trade, wait for other person to put money, item, etc.
2. Click accept first then right-click the item to where it says "remove 1 item".
3. Wait for the 2nd screen, hit to take item away, and then accept.
Poof! YOU GET THE ITEM BACK AND THE CASH!
How do I fix?
thank you for looking at this message.

item.title: How the hell?!
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

Lawl, its not in the Trade part. Must be in the Right click part. :S

Read full topic

@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

Just recently I found a bug that allows a player to scam in a trade screen.

Here are the steps to preforming it. Here are the steps.

  1. Place item up for trade, wait for other person to put money, item, etc.

  2. Click accept first then right-click the item to where it says “remove 1 item”.

  3. Wait for the 2nd screen, hit to take item away, and then accept.

Poof! YOU GET THE ITEM BACK AND THE CASH!

How do I fix?
